species.name: bunnelby
descriptions: It excels at digging holes. Using its ears, it can dig a nest 33 feet deep in one night.
It has ears like shovels. Digging holes strengthens its ears so much that they can sever thick roots effortlessly.
It’s very sensitive to danger. The sound of Corviknight’s flapping will have Bunnelby digging a hole to hide underground in moments.
They use their large ears to dig burrows. They will dig the whole night through.

abilities.name: pickup
abilities.effect: Picks up other Pokémon's used and Flung held items.  May also pick up an item after battle.

abilities.name: cheek-pouch
abilities.effect: Restores HP upon eating a Berry, in addition to the Berry's effect.
